title: BANDS x AIML Collab P1 – How to Build an ML Portfolio
description: Join a special collaboration between BANDS and AIML for How to Build an ML Portfolio 101 – Part 1 of a two-part series.
content: Explore ML tools like GitHub, Kaggle, and practical documentation.
Learn how to showcase your skills through hands-on experience.
Participate in student-led guidance sessions to build your portfolio.
